text: My daughter started learning drums at Rocktone since she was 3 years old. We are so grateful that she gets to learn under Teacher Derrick. He is full of energy and encouragement, and is great at motivating young children to learn and have fun. I also appreciate how Teacher Derrick is particular about the details so that the child builds a good foundation in drumming. My daughter enjoys her classes very much - itâ€™s such a joy to see her jamming with Teacher Derrick.

My sons have been taking drum lessons at Rocktone for about 6 months now. They really enjoy the lessons and the teachers are always friendly and accommodating to requests for schedule changes or simply to allow the children to have a more comfortable experience. I am glad my boys have picked up new skills and honed them with Rocktone!

I take guitar  and my 11 year old daughter takes drum lessons at Rocktone for the past few months. Both of us thoroughly enjoy our lessons under Derrick and his experienced team. My kid is moving steadily towards her dream of becoming a drummer and I love to jam with her on the guitar occasionally that Derrick helps to facilitate in the lovely colourful studio. One day, I hope to play in her band, thanks to Rocktone ðŸ™‚

The Rocktone team have provided a great foundation for my son in his drums through his progress. They focus on building foundation right before grooming it's students on various levels there after. Never regretted enrolling my son in this music academy. Keep up the sincere passion in teaching music on the right note!

Special mention to Xinda. He is a great instructor and very patient with kids! Keep it up buddy!

Justin enjoys every drum lesson at Rocktone He started when he was 3.5 years old. Principal coach Derrick and current coach Xin Da will tailor lessons and prepare drum pieces that will motivate and encourage him to increase in his skill level.
